text: X Tour may refer to: * x Tour (Ed Sheeran), 2015 * The X Tour (Christina Aguilera), 2019 * "X Tour", Ambassador 21, 2011 * "The X-Tour", see Spock's Beard discography * Dyro & Bassjackers Present X Tour, Dyro, 2014 *KylieX2008, 2008 ==See also== * Japan Dome Tour X, a concert tour by Big Bang * X (disambiguation)
title: X Tour
